Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory730.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Oh? It's just a stage?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "If there's nothing else to do here...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Wanshi grabs a present from the side, seemingly ready to lie down right here...'}
{2: "Isn't the floor quite rough?", 3: '9'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Hm... It's alright.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Although I didn't bring the pillow you gave me, compared to the ruins that just witnessed a battle or other places...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "This place isn't too bad at all.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Wanshi is already lying comfortably on the floor, his hands closed above his chest, and he looks rather peaceful.'}
{2: 'Are you sleeping already?', 3: '15'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Hm? Is there something else?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Wanshi pulls open his sleep mask and turns to look at you bleary-eyed.'}
{2: 'Should we... take a walk on the beach down there?', 3: '19'}
{3: 'You feel like this is not the right way to spend your time in a maze that is themed after spring.'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'The beach...? I guess.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory533.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Wanshi gets up deftly and follows you to the soft, sandy beach.'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "It's... pretty nice.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Before you can say anything, Wanshi lies down at the edge of the beach, lazily staring at the simulated sky above.'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Do you want to give it a try, Commandant? The sand is much more comfortable.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Wanshi's voice seems to have the power to lure you to sleep. You are already lying down on the beach before you can think it through."}
{3: "It's... actually pretty nice."}
{3: 'A sensation completely different from the maintenance chamber envelops you. Waves crash against the shore, making a gentle, rhythmic sound.'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: '...Yawn. It is more comfortable to sleep next to you...', 4: '1'}
{3: "You vaguely hear Wanshi's mumbling, but you cannot hear it clearly. Soon, you are embraced by a sweet dream..."}
